verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> her abominations, <S%H8441><s%>

and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> "Your origin <S%H4351><s%> and your birth <S%H4138><s%> are from the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> your father was an Amorite <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H567><s%> a Hittite. <S%H517><s%>

"As for your birth, <S%H4138><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> you were born <S%H3205><s%> your navel <S%H8270><s%> cord <S%H8270><s%> was not cut, <S%H3772><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> were you washed <S%H7364><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%> for cleansing; <S%H4935><s%> you were not rubbed <S%H4414><s%> with salt <S%H4414><s%> or even wrapped <S%H2853><s%> in cloths. <S%H2853><s%>

"No <S%H3808><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> looked <S%H2347><s%> with pity <S%H2347><s%> on you to do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> for you, to have <S%H2550><s%> compassion <S%H2550><s%> on you. Rather you were thrown <S%H7993><s%> out into the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> for you were abhorred <S%H1604><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> you were born. <S%H3205><s%>

"When I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you and saw <S%H7200><s%> you squirming <S%H947><s%> in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to you [while you were] in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> 'Live! <S%H2421><s%>' I said <S%H559><s%> to you while you were in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> 'Live! <S%H2421><s%>'

"I made <S%H5414><s%> you numerous <S%H7233><s%> like plants <S%H6780><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%> Then you grew <S%H7235><s%> up, became <S%H1431><s%> tall, <S%H1431><s%> and reached <S%H935><s%> the age <S%H935><s%> for fine <S%H5716><s%> ornaments; <S%H5716><s%> [your] breasts <S%H7699><s%> were formed <S%H3559><s%> and your hair <S%H8181><s%> had grown. <S%H6779><s%> Yet you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare. <S%H6181><s%>

"Then I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you and saw <S%H7200><s%> you, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> you were at the time <S%H6256><s%> for love; <S%H1730><s%> so I spread <S%H6566><s%> My skirt <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you and covered <S%H3680><s%> your nakedness. <S%H6172><s%> I also swore <S%H7650><s%> to you and entered <S%H935><s%> into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you so that you became <S%H1961><s%> Mine," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
"Then I bathed <S%H7364><s%> you with water, <S%H4325><s%> washed <S%H7857><s%> off <S%H7857><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%> from you, and anointed <S%H5480><s%> you with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

"I also clothed <S%H3847><s%> you with embroidered <S%H7553><s%> cloth, <S%H7553><s%> and put <S%H9336><s%> sandals <S%H9336><s%> of porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skin <S%H8476><s%> on your feet; and I wrapped <S%H2280><s%> you with fine <S%H8336><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> you with silk. <S%H4897><s%>

"And I adorned <S%H5710><s%> you with ornaments, <S%H5716><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and a necklace <S%H7242><s%> around <S%H5921><s%> your neck. <S%H1627><s%>

"I also put <S%H5414><s%> a ring <S%H5141><s%> in your nostril, <S%H639><s%> earrings <S%H5694><s%> in your ears, <S%H241><s%> and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> on your head. <S%H7218><s%>

"Thus you were adorned <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and your dress <S%H4403><s%> was of fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> silk, <S%H4897><s%> and embroidered <S%H7553><s%> cloth. <S%H7553><s%> You ate <S%H398><s%> fine <S%H5560><s%> flour, <S%H5560><s%> honey, <S%H1706><s%> and oil; <S%H8081><s%> so you were exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> beautiful <S%H3302><s%> and advanced <S%H6743><s%> to royalty. <S%H4410><s%>

"Then your fame <S%H8034><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> on account of your beauty, <S%H3308><s%> for it was perfect <S%H3632><s%> because of My splendor <S%H1926><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I bestowed <S%H7760><s%> on you," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"But you trusted <S%H982><s%> in your beauty <S%H3308><s%> and played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of your fame, <S%H8034><s%> and you poured <S%H8210><s%> out your harlotries <S%H8457><s%> on every <S%H3605><s%> passer-by who might be [willing.]

"And you took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of your clothes, <S%H899><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> for yourself high <S%H1116><s%> places <S%H1116><s%> of various <S%H2921><s%> colors, <S%H2921><s%> and played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> on them, which should never <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> about nor <S%H3808><s%> happen. <S%H1961><s%>

"You also took <S%H3947><s%> your beautiful <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> [made <S%H6213><s%>] of My gold <S%H2091><s%> and of My silver, <S%H3701><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> you, and made for yourself male <S%H2145><s%> images <S%H6754><s%> that you might play <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with them.

"Then you took <S%H3947><s%> your embroidered <S%H7553><s%> cloth <S%H899><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> them, and offered <S%H5414><s%> My oil <S%H8081><s%> and My incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

"Also My bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> you, fine <S%H5560><s%> flour, <S%H5560><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%> with which I fed <S%H398><s%> you, you would offer <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> so it happened, <S%H1961><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"Moreover, you took <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you had borne <S%H3205><s%> to Me, and you sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> them to idols to be devoured. <S%H398><s%> Were your harlotries <S%H8457><s%> so <S%H4592><s%> small <S%H4592><s%> a matter?
"You slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> My children, <S%H1121><s%> and offered <S%H5414><s%> them up to idols by causing them to pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> [the fire.]

"And besides <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> and harlotries <S%H8457><s%> you did not remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> when you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%> and squirming <S%H947><s%> in your blood. <S%H1818><s%>

"Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your wickedness <S%H9567><s%> ('Woe, <S%H188><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> to you!' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%>),
that you built <S%H1129><s%> yourself a shrine <S%H1354><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> yourself a high <S%H7413><s%> place <S%H7413><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> square. <S%H7339><s%>

"You built <S%H1129><s%> yourself a high <S%H7413><s%> place <S%H7413><s%> at the top <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> street, <S%H1870><s%> and made <S%H8581><s%> your beauty <S%H3308><s%> abominable; <S%H8581><s%> and you spread <S%H6589><s%> your legs <S%H7272><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> passer-by to multiply <S%H7235><s%> your harlotry. <S%H8457><s%>

"You also played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> your lustful <S%H1320><s%> <S%H1432><s%> neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your harlotry <S%H8457><s%> to make <S%H3707><s%> Me angry. <S%H3707><s%>

"Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, I have stretched <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you and diminished <S%H1639><s%> your rations. <S%H2706><s%> And I delivered <S%H5414><s%> you up to the desire <S%H5315><s%> of those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> who are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of your lewd <S%H2154><s%> conduct. <S%H1870><s%>

"Moreover, you played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with the Assyrians <S%H804><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> you were not satisfied; <S%H7654><s%> you even played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with them and still <S%H1571><s%> were not satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

"You also multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your harlotry <S%H8457><s%> with the land <S%H776><s%> of merchants, <S%H9211><s%> Chaldea, <S%H3778><s%> yet even <S%H1571><s%> with this <S%H384><s%> you were not satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>"' "

"How <S%H4100><s%> languishing <S%H535><s%> is your heart, <S%H3826><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "while you do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H4639><s%> the actions <S%H4639><s%> of a bold-faced harlot. <S%H2181><s%>

"When you built <S%H1129><s%> your shrine <S%H1354><s%> at the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> street <S%H1870><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> your high <S%H7413><s%> place <S%H7413><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> square, <S%H7339><s%> in disdaining <S%H7046><s%> money, <S%H868><s%> you were not like a harlot. <S%H2181><s%>
"You adulteress <S%H5003><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> who takes <S%H3947><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of her husband! <S%H376><s%>

"Men give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> harlots, <S%H2181><s%> but you give <S%H5414><s%> your gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your lovers <S%H157><s%> to bribe <S%H7809><s%> them to come <S%H935><s%> to you from every <S%H5439><s%> direction <S%H5439><s%> for your harlotries. <S%H8457><s%>

"Thus you are different <S%H2016><s%> from those women <S%H802><s%> in your harlotries, <S%H8457><s%> in that no <S%H3808><s%> one plays <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> as you do, because you give <S%H5414><s%> money <S%H868><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> money <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> you; thus you are different. <S%H2016><s%>"
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> O harlot, <S%H2181><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> your lewdness <S%H9323><s%> was poured <S%H8210><s%> out and your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> uncovered <S%H1540><s%> through your harlotries <S%H8457><s%> with your lovers <S%H157><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your detestable <S%H8441><s%> idols, <S%H1544><s%> and because of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you gave <S%H5414><s%> to idols,

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I shall gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your lovers <S%H157><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> you took <S%H6149><s%> pleasure, <S%H6149><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> those whom <S%H834><s%> you loved <S%H157><s%> [and] all <S%H3605><s%> those whom <S%H834><s%> you hated. <S%H8130><s%> So I shall gather <S%H6908><s%> them against <S%H5921><s%> you from every <S%H5439><s%> direction <S%H5439><s%> and expose <S%H1540><s%> your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> to them that they may see <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

"Thus I shall judge <S%H8199><s%> you, like women who commit <S%H5003><s%> adultery <S%H5003><s%> or shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged; <S%H4941><s%> and I shall bring <S%H5414><s%> on you the blood <S%H1818><s%> of wrath <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

"I shall also give <S%H5414><s%> you into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of your lovers, and they will tear <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> your shrines, <S%H1354><s%> demolish <S%H5422><s%> your high <S%H7413><s%> places, <S%H7413><s%> strip <S%H6584><s%> you of your clothing, <S%H899><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> away your jewels, <S%H3627><s%> <S%H8597><s%> and will leave <S%H5117><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare. <S%H6181><s%>

"They will incite <S%H5927><s%> a crowd <S%H6951><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and they will stone <S%H7275><s%> you and cut <S%H1333><s%> you to pieces <S%H1333><s%> with their swords. <S%H2719><s%>

"And they will burn <S%H8313><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women. <S%H802><s%> Then I shall stop <S%H7673><s%> you from playing <S%H2181><s%> the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and you will also <S%H1571><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> pay <S%H5414><s%> your lovers. <S%H868><s%>

"So I shall calm <S%H5117><s%> My fury <S%H2534><s%> against you, and My jealousy <S%H7068><s%> will depart <S%H5493><s%> from you, and I shall be pacified <S%H8252><s%> and angry <S%H3707><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth <S%H5271><s%> but have enraged <S%H7264><s%> Me by all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H428><s%> behold, <S%H1887><s%> I in turn <S%H1571><s%> will bring <S%H5414><s%> your conduct <S%H1870><s%> down <S%H5414><s%> on your own head, <S%H7218><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "so that you will not commit <S%H6213><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> on top <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your [other] abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who quotes <S%H9301><s%> proverbs <S%H9301><s%> will quote <S%H9301><s%> [this] proverb <S%H9301><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Like mother, <S%H517><s%> like daughter. <S%H1323><s%>'

"You are the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> who loathed <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and children. <S%H1121><s%> You are also the sister <S%H269><s%> of your sisters, <S%H269><s%> who <S%H834><s%> loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H376><s%> and children. <S%H1121><s%> Your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite <S%H2850><s%> and your father an Amorite. <S%H1><s%>

"Now your older <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> who lives <S%H3427><s%> north <S%H8040><s%> of you with her daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and your younger <S%H6996><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> who lives <S%H3427><s%> south <S%H3225><s%> of you, is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> with her daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

"Yet you have not merely walked <S%H1980><s%> in their ways <S%H1870><s%> or done <S%H6213><s%> according to their abominations; <S%H8441><s%> but, as if that were too <S%H6985><s%> little, <S%H4592><s%> you acted <S%H7843><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> corruptly <S%H7843><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your conduct <S%H1870><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they.

"As I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> your sister, <S%H269><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> have not done <S%H6213><s%> as you and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> have done. <S%H6213><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> was the guilt <S%H5771><s%> of your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom: <S%H5467><s%> she and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> arrogance, <S%H1347><s%> abundant <S%H7654><s%> food, <S%H3899><s%> and careless <S%H8252><s%> ease, <S%H7962><s%> but she did not help <S%H2388><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>

"Thus they were haughty <S%H1361><s%> and committed <S%H6213><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me. Therefore I removed <S%H5493><s%> them when <S%H9201><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> [it.]

"Furthermore, Samaria <S%H8111><s%> did not commit <S%H2398><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of your sins, <S%H9128><s%> for you have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they. Thus you have made <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%> appear righteous <S%H6663><s%> by all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

"Also <S%H1571><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> your disgrace <S%H3639><s%> in that you have made <S%H6419><s%> judgment <S%H6419><s%> favorable <S%H6419><s%> for your sisters. <S%H269><s%> Because of your sins <S%H9128><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you acted <S%H8581><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> abominably <S%H8581><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they, they are more <S%H4480><s%> in the right <S%H6663><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you. Yes, <S%H1571><s%> be also <S%H1571><s%> ashamed <S%H954><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> your disgrace, <S%H3639><s%> in that you made <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%> appear righteous. <S%H6663><s%>
